frontmatter.title: Create a log of all of the data that is important to the organisation
frontmatter.description: Use write-only logging on your company systems to track access and maintain an audit log. Think of the 4 W's: when, who, what, where. When was it accessed? Who wanted access? What was accessed? Where was the data sent to?

frontmatter.title: Prevent access to the administrative interface from the Internet, unless there is a clear and documented business need.
Use IP Allowlists (Whitelists) on Firewalls and block all other connections by default.
